name: Quickswap
description: QuickSwap is the leading DEX on Polygon PoS, Polygon zkEVM, & Dogechain, best known for it's blazing fast transaction speeds and near-zero gas fees. The DEX was launched in 2020 & provides DeFi features such as swaps, liquidity providing, farming, & staking. It's also home to the DragonFi ecosystem, a powerful DeFi product suite that includes a decentralized Perpetual Exchange (QuickPerps), Gaming Hub, and much more. $QUICK (New) is QuickSwap's native token & redenominated in 2022 at a 1:1000 ratio from the $QUICK (OLD) token (via a token split). New $QUICK can be staked in the Dragon's Lair on the QuickSwap DEX to earn yield & used in farms to earn farming rewards. While the Old $QUICK token does not have any utility on the DEX, users can easily convert it to New $QUICK via QuickSwap's converter.
